item.description:
Join us for The 12th Annual Riverfront Dragon Boat & Asian Festival featuring Asian entertainment, martial arts demonstrations, educational cultural booths, delicious Asian cuisine, Asian games for kids and much more.  (and of course, dragon boat racing!)

 

Event starts at 10am and it will last till 2pm, so you don't necessarily have to show up exactly at 10  - but we will be there by 10am.

 

For more info: http://www.riverfront.org/events/dragon/
item.how_to_find_us: Call us at 203.830.9015 the day of to find our exact meeting spot

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Hartford Riverfront Dragon Boat Festival
